title: CIO Review Recognizes Noser Engineering AG as a Top 20 ALM Solution Provider in 2015
text:
CIO Review Recognizes Noser Engineering AG as a Top 20 ALM Solution Provider in 2015 [October 12, 2015] Tweet 
WINTERTHUR , Switzerland , October 12, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- 
Noser Engineering AG , the Swiss based global information technology consultancy announced today it was named by CIO Review as a top 20 ALM Solution Provider in 2015. The CIO Review's Most Promising ALM Solution Providers is an annual listing of the top twenty companies at the forefront of Application Lifecycle Management. 
(Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20121203/579904 ) 
A distinguished panel comprising of CEOs, CIOs, VCs, analysts including CIO Review editorial board determined the "20 Most Promising ALM Technology Providers in 2015. "Today, most businesses rely heavily on high quality software applications to reduce unwanted expenses, streamline their mission critical activities and reach out to a wider customer base. In the last few months, we have looked at hundreds of ALM solution providers and shortlisted the ones that are at the forefront of takling the challenges," writes CIO Review, ALM Technology Special, September 2015 . 
Application Lifecycle Management is a continuous process of managing the life of an application through governance, development and maintenance. ALM synchronizes, automates and optimizes the relationships and dependencies between business management and software engineering. 
"We decided that we have to support two ALM tool chains: one for our open source and the other for the Microsoft Team Foundation Server," said Beat Zollinger, COO, Noser Engineering AG . "We support different testing tools like HP Quality Center, Ranorex and Microsoft Team Foundation Test Suite on our own infrastructure," adds Zollinger. "We are pleased to receive this recognition from CIO Review for our ALM services offering." 
Noser Engineering ensures ALM processes are risk-free, and deadlines are met with an early and actionable, integrated feedback mechanism resulting in measurable productivity gains and improved regulatory compliance. 
About Noser Engineering AG: 
Noser Engineering is a market-leading software engineering firm headquartered in Switzerland providing solutions since 1984 to Fortune 500, local, European and multinational companies. Noser Engineering are members of the Noser Group of companies. For more information, please visit: http://www.noser.com . 
Android is a trademark of Google Inc. Team Foundation Server is a trademark of Microsoft Corporation. Ranorex is a trademark of Ranorex GmbH. HP Quality Center is a trademark of Hewlett-Packard Development Company, L.P.
